mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new map of the British colonies in North America: shewing the seat of the present war, taken from the best surveys, compared with and improved from manuscripts of several noblemen and gentlemen / By John Andrews
British colonies in North America
Seat of the present war
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Andrews, John, 1736-1809
Harris, John, 1756-1846
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Publish'd according to Act of Parliament, Jany. 16th. 1781 by John Andrews, at Mr. Blisset's No. 29 Long Ave. and John Harris, No. 3, Sweetings Alley Cornhill.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes listing of "References to the names of the counties not inserted in this map."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS. Marked browning from old tape along right vertical fold. Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: North America--Maps--Early works to 1800.
New England--Maps--Early works to 1800.
